title: ion-radio
body: Radios should be used inside of an
. Pressing on a radio will check it. They can also be checked programmatically by setting the value property of the parent
to the value of the radio.

When radios are inside of a radio group, only one radio in the group will be checked at any time. Pressing a radio will check it and uncheck the previously selected radio, if there is one. If a radio is not in a group with another radio, then both radios will have the ability to be checked at the same time.

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true, the user cannot interact with the radio.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: name
props.docs: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

docs:
Radios should be used inside of an [`ion-radio-group`](../radio-group). Pressing on a radio will check it. They can also be checked programmatically by setting the value property of the parent `ion-radio-group` to the value of the radio.

When radios are inside of a radio group, only one radio in the group will be checked at any time. Pressing a radio will check it and uncheck the previously selected radio, if there is one. If a radio is not in a group with another radio, then both radios will have the ability to be checked at the same time.

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp

docsTags.text: container - The container for the radio mark.
docsTags.name: part

docsTags.text: mark - The checkmark or dot used to indicate the checked state.
docsTags.name: part

events.docs: Emitted when the radio button loses focus.
Emitted when the radio button has focus.

styles.name: --inner-border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the inner checked radio
